## Container.getMap() method

Get a repository item as a .

Signature:

```typescript
getMap(key?: string): Map<string, any>;
```

Decorators:

`@bind`

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description |
| --------- | ------ | ----------- |
| key       | string |             |

Returns:

Map&lt;string, any&gt;

## Remarks

If no key is passed the container store is mapped.

## Example 1

Returns `repository.item` as a Map:

```js
container.getMap("item");
```

## Example 2

Returns the entire repository as a Map:

```js
container.getMap();
```
